page.title: 06TOURISM
page.content:
a public house and an old-peoples home.
{TOURISM
The Village of Chipping is now becoming a centre of Tourism, due to the exceptional beauty of the countryside throughout the whole area, and Tourism is now being encouraged by the Ribble Valley Borough Council in association with the North West Tourist Board.
In the summertime hundreds of people visit the Village, especially on Sundays, most of them coming by car and bicycle, as there are only three buses into the Village on Sundays, and some of the local traders are busy catering for their needs. This summer trade provides part-time employment
